item.description: More than half of American workers don't have a college degree. Is manufacturing a ticket for them to the middle class?

item.title: Why Japan sees President Trump's tariffs as a 'national crisis'
item.description: Although largely paused, President Trump's tariffs present a major threat to Japan's already flagging economy.
